com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler.uninstall

Class UninstallRecorder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler.uninstall.UninstallRecorder

  • public class UninstallRecorder
extends java.lang.Object
    Records to persistent storage the result of uninstalling/destroying resources in the process of installing the service by marking them with a tombstone id, then notifying the uninstall plan of the changes.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UninstallRecorder(StateStore stateStore, java.util.Collection<ResourceCleanupStep> resourceSteps) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void recordCleanupOrUninstall(java.util.Collection<OfferResources> offerResources)
      Used in the case of uninstall and cleanup when we are removing any unrecognized resources.
      void recordDecommission(java.util.Collection<OfferRecommendation> offerRecommendations)
      Used in the case of decommissioning when we are proactively removing offered resources via offer evaluation.
